summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, from North 77th Street to North 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8429 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
